name: Codename: Last Stand
description:
Codename: Last Stand is a WIP Zombie Tower Defense for our Game Group 2 class at Bloomfield College

Controls:

Camera- Mouse & WASD

Enable/Disable Camera: Q

Into Buildmode: Click Turret

Out of Buildmode: Double Click Turret

Move Turret: WASD

Credits:

Tristan Diaz: Programming

Brianna Matheson: 3D Model

Daniel Gurrieri: Sound

Brian Perez: 3D Model
